trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The jermlaine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Vermin Friend
entries: The jermlaine can speak to and understand rats and giant rats.

trait.name: Swarming Rush
entries: A jermlaine adds {@dice 1d4} to its weapon damage rolls while within 5 feet of another, conscious jermlaine.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit -1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.
